headline.print_headline: Malaysia Airlines Scraps 'Bucket List' Promo Title
headline.main: Malaysia Airlines Scraps 'Bucket List' Promo Title

docs.snippet: Malaysia Airlines has scrapped the title of a competition asking people what activities and destinations are on their "bucket list," acknowledging it was inappropriate given the two deadly disasters it has suffered this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia Airlines has scrapped the title of a competition asking people what activities and destinations are on their "bucket list," acknowledging it was inappropriate given the two deadly disasters it has suffered this year.

headline.print_headline: Soler Drives in Two More Runs as Cubs Beat Brewers
headline.main: Soler Drives in Two More Runs as Cubs Beat Brewers

docs.snippet: Rookie Jorge Soler had a two-run double to become the second player in Cubs history with as many as 10 RBIs in his first seven games as Chicago beat Milwaukee 6-2 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rookie Jorge Soler had a two-run double to become the second player in Cubs history with as many as 10 RBIs in his first seven games as Chicago beat Milwaukee 6-2 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Carter's 2 Homers Lead Astros Over Angels 4-1
headline.main: Carter's 2 Homers Lead Astros Over Angels 4-1

docs.snippet: Chris Carter homered twice and drove in three runs, Collin McHugh pitched into the eighth inning and the Houston Astros beat the Los Angeles Angels 4-1 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Carter homered twice and drove in three runs, Collin McHugh pitched into the eighth inning and the Houston Astros beat the Los Angeles Angels 4-1 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Gordon's 2-Run Shot Leads Royals Over Rangers 4-1
headline.main: Gordon's 2-Run Shot Leads Royals Over Rangers 4-1

docs.snippet: Alex Gordon hit a two-run homer, Jason Vargas pitched into the seventh inning and the Kansas City Royals beat the Texas Rangers 4-1 on Wednesday night to finish off a three-game sweep....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Gordon hit a two-run homer, Jason Vargas pitched into the seventh inning and the Kansas City Royals beat the Texas Rangers 4-1 on Wednesday night to finish off a three-game sweep.

headline.main: Untold Stories After the Arab Spring

docs.snippet: A new website and book feature the work of North African photographers whose projects show aspects of life overshadowed by the region’s tumult....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new website and book feature the work of North African photographers whose projects show aspects of life overshadowed by the region’s tumult.

headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Homer Their Way Past Rays 7-4
headline.main: Blue Jays Homer Their Way Past Rays 7-4

docs.snippet: Dioner Navarro and Edwin Encarnacion each hit two-run home runs and the Toronto Blue Jays rolled to their fourth straight win with a 7-4 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays on Wedesnday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dioner Navarro and Edwin Encarnacion each hit two-run home runs and the Toronto Blue Jays rolled to their fourth straight win with a 7-4 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays on Wedesnday night.

headline.print_headline: Japan's First Lady Speaks Out Ahead of Sales Tax Decision
headline.main: Japan's First Lady Speaks Out Ahead of Sales Tax Decision

docs.snippet: Japanese First Lady Akie Abe said on Thursday the country should consider cutting wasteful spending and boosting the economy before going ahead with a rise in the sales tax to 10 percent, as her husband wrestles with just that decision....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese First Lady Akie Abe said on Thursday the country should consider cutting wasteful spending and boosting the economy before going ahead with a rise in the sales tax to 10 percent, as her husband wrestles with just that decision.

headline.print_headline: Nishikori Is 1st Japan Slam Semifinalist Since '33
headline.main: Nishikori Is 1st Japan Slam Semifinalist Since '33

docs.snippet: Kei Nishikori felt like he had jet lag....

headline.print_headline: D'Arnaud's RBI Double Lifts Mets Over Marlins 4-3
headline.main: D'Arnaud's RBI Double Lifts Mets Over Marlins 4-3

docs.snippet: Travis d'Arnaud hit a go-ahead RBI double in the eighth inning to lift the New York Mets to a 4-3 win over the Miami Marlins on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Travis d'Arnaud hit a go-ahead RBI double in the eighth inning to lift the New York Mets to a 4-3 win over the Miami Marlins on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: McCann Gets 4 Hits, Yanks Top Red Sox to End Skid
headline.main: McCann Gets 4 Hits, Yanks Top Red Sox to End Skid

docs.snippet: Brian McCann homered among his career high-tying four hits and the New York Yankees bounced back to end a three-game losing streak, beating the Boston Red Sox 5-1 Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brian McCann homered among his career high-tying four hits and the New York Yankees bounced back to end a three-game losing streak, beating the Boston Red Sox 5-1 Wednesday night.
